Class DatabaseConnector

extends Object
    Database connector for easy connection with ebean databases.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseConnector

        public DatabaseConnector​(boolean defaultServer)
        Get a database connector. The database can be the default server.
        Parameters:
        defaultServer - Should the connected database be the default database?

      • DatabaseConnector

        public DatabaseConnector()
        Get a database connector. The database will not be the default server.

    • Method Detail

      • loadDatabaseDrivers

        public static void loadDatabaseDrivers()
                                throws ClassNotFoundException
        Load and initialize the database drivers. Execute this once before connecting to a database.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If a driver was not found a ClassNotFoundException will then be thrown.

      • connectToDatabase

        Connect to a database.
